Description: Qaliyan, tobacco-pipe. Made of black, blue underglaze pottery.
Curator's comments: Hookah -base painted in underglaze black and white with motifs from Chinese Wanli or Transitional porcelaibs Iran, 1600-50
Bibliographic references: Lane 1957 / Later Islamic Pottery: Persia, Syria, Egypt, Turkey (fig.76.B)
Pinder-Wilson 1976b / Oriental Ceramics, the world's great collections: the British Museum (fig.300)
Canby 1999 / The Golden Age of Persian Art 1501-1722 (fig.107)
